name: You are the dice
description:
*THE WEBGL MADE THE LIGHTING WEIRD IN SOME PLACES*

Dowload for best experience

Game made in 2 days for GMTK 2022,

you play as a mouse (who is the dice) playing Snakes and ladders, ik its not usually a dice sometimes its a bottle cap but the dice was what was represented as you usually when i played it .

its pretty buggy and unfinished and ill fix it after the jam,

(the mouse is a dice because mice rhymes with dice, totally original)

twitter: gamedevperson
